name: Menubar.Root

closeOnEscape.description: Whether to close the open menubar menu when the escape key is pressed.
closeOnEscape.description_zh: Whether to close the open menubar menu when the escape key is pressed.

loop.description: Whether or not to loop through the menubar menu triggers when navigating with the keyboard.
loop.description_zh: Whether or not to loop through the menubar menu triggers when navigating with the keyboard.

preventScroll.description: Whether or not to prevent scrolling the body while a menu in the menubar is open.
preventScroll.description_zh: Whether or not to prevent scrolling the body while a menu in the menubar is open.

asChild.description: Whether to use render delegation with this component or not.
asChild.description_zh: Whether to use render delegation with this component or not.

el.description: The underlying DOM element being rendered. You can bind to this to programatically interact with the element.
el.description_zh: The underlying DOM element being rendered. You can bind to this to programatically interact with the element.

description: The root menubar component which manages & scopes the state of the menubar.

slots.name: builder
slots.description: The builder attributes and actions to apply to the element if using the asChild prop with delegation.
slots.description_zh: The builder attributes and actions to apply to the element if using the asChild prop with delegation.

slots.name: ids
slots.description: The ids of the elements within the component, useful when you don't necessarily want to provide a custom ID, but still want access to the ID being assigned (if any).
slots.description_zh: The ids of the elements within the component, useful when you don't necessarily want to provide a custom ID, but still want access to the ID being assigned (if any).
